caption: This photograph depicts a scene of pollution in a natural water body. In the foreground, there's a discarded Pepsi can floating among other debris and decaying plant matter in dark blue-tinted water. Surrounding the can are scattered pieces of sticks and partially submerged vegetation. Tall green reed-like plants ascend from the bottom edge, framing the image and partially obscuring the view. In the middle ground, additional trash can be seen floating on the water, including a prominent white container lying on its side. The background is less focused, contributing to a sense of depth and helping to emphasize the foreground pollution. The overall mood conveyed by the image is one of neglect and environmental degradation.
title: Pepsi can floats on the Wisconsin River at Merrill
